title: Full Stack Developer, Senior/Lead NEW!
full_description: About UsOver 360 million people worldwide experience hearing loss, yet 80% of them do nothing about it. At Eargo, we?re striving to disrupt an industry that?s desperate for change. We?re a family of engineers and entrepreneurs with an ambition to dream big, and we?re looking to you to join us and help make it all happen.Position SummaryThe Senior Software Engineer, Full Stack will be responsible for leading a team in developing, maintaining and optimizing the web and eCommerce experience at Eargo.
